6 (extended) | duration = | event = | characters = | previous = [[The Three Hunters]] | next = [[Massacre at the Fords of Isen]] }} '''The Burnings of the Westfold''' is the fifth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' and the sixth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition. ==Synopsis== The Uruk-hai approach a village at Rohan. A woman sends her children by horse to [[Edoras]] to spread the bad news. As an off-voice, Saruman claims that "Rohan will fall". [[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers scenes|06]]
